link.title: Prairie View School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: The Governor of Nebraska has now issued guidance that all schools in the state are to be closed to the public through May 31st. All extracurricular activities are also to be canceled.
At this time there will continue to be limited staffing at the High School and Prairie View. Phones will be answered during normal business hours at the following numbers:
